DisplayList.valUnicode: POM (public account) ,POM (firm account) ,FB/Intermediate/POM ,Off floor trader ,FB specialist ,Market maker

ExpSyntax.val: IF ({0,14}=1,MlsTrans ('POM (public account)'),IF ({0,14}=2,MlsTrans ('POM (firm account)'),IF ({0,14}=3,'FB/Intermediate/POM',IF ({0,14}=4,MlsTrans ('Off Floor Trader'),IF ({0,14}=5,MlsTrans ('FB specialist'),IF ({0,14}=6,MlsTrans ('Market maker'),''))))))
